Sentencas: Surface reactions of O-2 molecules on a Sr-doped LaMnO3 (LSM) cathode and Pd impregnated LSM cathode are investigated by the first principles method.
Titulo: Oxygen adsorption properties on a palladium promoted La1-xSrxMnO3 solid oxide fuel cell cathode

Sentencas: A tetrahedral Pd-4 cluster is used to simulate the Pd particles on the LSM surface.
Titulo: Oxygen adsorption properties on a palladium promoted La1-xSrxMnO3 solid oxide fuel cell cathode

Sentencas: The calculated adsorption energies demonstrate that the pre-adsorbed Pd facilitates O-2 adsorption on the surface.
Titulo: Oxygen adsorption properties on a palladium promoted La1-xSrxMnO3 solid oxide fuel cell cathode

Sentencas: The bond length of adsorbed O-2 species and corresponding dissociation energies indicate that O-2 molecules on the Pd/LSM cathode surface can be dissociated more easily than on the pure LSM surface.
Titulo: Oxygen adsorption properties on a palladium promoted La1-xSrxMnO3 solid oxide fuel cell cathode

Sentencas: The pre-adsorbed Pd (atom and cluster) can serve as an active center on the surface and enhance the electron transference properties during the oxygen reduction reactions.
Titulo: Oxygen adsorption properties on a palladium promoted La1-xSrxMnO3 solid oxide fuel cell cathode
